```{r setup}
library(RobustTSLS)
data('nak_out_data')
```

```{r setup}
Y_mat_or <- data_nak[[1]]
W_mat_or <- data_nak[[2]]
Z <- data_nak[[3]]
start_year <- 1968
state_names <- data_nak[[4]]
T <- dim(W_mat_or)[2]
T_0 <- 10
```


```{r}
simulation(Y_mat_or, W_mat_or, Z, 
           share_t = 1/3, share_rank = 1/3, 
           rho_agg = 0.5, rho_theta_w = 0.2, rho_theta_y = 0.3, 
           B = 1000, S = 300, 
           test = FALSE, return_table = TRUE,
           K = 300, deg = 4, 
           height = 9 * 0.75, width = 16 * 0.75, 
           plot_folder = NULL, save_pdf = FALSE, save_sim = FALSE,
           sim_folder = NULL, sim_name = 'simulation_result', 
           seed = 1234)

```
